product_name: Black Diamond Positron Straight Gate Carabiner
long_description: The Black Diamond Positron Straight Gate carabiner delivers the antisnag benefits of a keylock nose at an affordable price. Positron carabiner has a keylock nose that won't snag on webbing or bolt hangers. The 'biner measures slightly smaller than the Black Diamond Dynotron carabiner, yet is still easy to hold. The Black Diamond Positron Straight gate carabiner works well on a quickdraw.
short_description: The Black Diamond Positron Straight Gate carabiner delivers the antisnag benefits of a keylock nose at an affordable price.
